actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to add social security benefits to the annuity and pension payments which are exempt from levy thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Includes social security benefits to the annuity and pension payments which are exempt from tax levy for the collection of unpaid taxes under the Internal Revenue Code. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 6334)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to add social security benefits to the annuity and pension payments which are exempt from levy thereunder.
